Hi,

This output explains all:


heritrix-3.1.1/bin$ cp 
'./jobs/aud/20130822070105/warcs/WEB-20130822070125574-00000-11120~AUD-ELIDED.au.elided.local~18443.warc.gz' 
~
heritrix-3.1.1/bin$ ./arcreader 
~/WEB-20130822070125574-00000-11120~AUD-ELIDED.au.elided.local~18443.warc.gz
Exception processing 
/home/shaddy/WEB-20130822070125574-00000-11120~AUD-ELIDED.au.elided.local~18443.warc.gz: 
org.archive.io.warc.WARCReaderFactory$CompressedWARCReader cannot be 
cast to org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader
java.lang.ClassCastException: 
org.archive.io.warc.WARCReaderFactory$CompressedWARCReader cannot be 
cast to org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader
         at 
org.archive.io.arc.ARCReaderFactory.get(ARCReaderFactory.java:66)
         at org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader.main(ARCReader.java:535)
heritrix-3.1.1/bin$ gunzip 
/home/shaddy/WEB-20130822070125574-00000-11120~AUD-ELIDED.au.elided.local~18443.warc.gz
heritrix-3.1.1/bin$ ./arcreader 
~/WEB-20130822070125574-00000-11120~AUD-ELIDED.au.elided.local~18443.warc
Exception processing 
/home/shaddy/WEB-20130822070125574-00000-11120~AUD-ELIDED.au.elided.local~18443.warc: 
org.archive.io.warc.WARCReaderFactory$UncompressedWARCReader cannot be 
cast to org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader
java.lang.ClassCastException: 
org.archive.io.warc.WARCReaderFactory$UncompressedWARCReader cannot be 
cast to org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader
         at 
org.archive.io.arc.ARCReaderFactory.get(ARCReaderFactory.java:66)
         at org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader.main(ARCReader.java:535)

I ran into the same issue with heritrix-1.14.4, which has me
second-guessing what I am doing.

Note, both Java 6 and 7 attempted. Perhaps I need 1.5???

-- 
Regards,
Shaddy
